channel.title: How do i make it so ppl can do command only once
channel.description: i made a server and i need to no how to make it so people can use the ::starter command once please help thank you

item.title: How do i make it so ppl can do command only once
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {	
            if (starter == 0) {
//stuff you want
                starter = 1;
                savemoreinfo();
                savechar();
            } else if (starter == 1) {
//stuff you want
            }
        }
